get.summary: Perform a search (query) for
get.description: The search operation calls the database and loads results either from cache or data store. Care should be taken in the number of results retrieved by this operation.

parameters.name: _offset
parameters.description: The offet of the first result to return

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: The count of items to return in this result set

parameters.name: _orderBy
parameters.description: Instructs the result set to be ordered

parameters.name: _includeRefs
parameters.description: True if all referenced objects should be loaded

parameters.name: _lean
parameters.description: True if the result bundle should only contains primary results

parameters.name: _all
parameters.description: True if all properties should be expanded

parameters.name: _expand
parameters.description: The names of the properties which should be forced loaded

parameters.name: _exclude
parameters.description: The names of the properties which should removed from the bundle

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Gets or sets the name of the code system

parameters.name: oid
parameters.description: Gets or sets the Oid of the code system

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: Gets or sets the authority of the code system

parameters.name: obsoletionReason
parameters.description: Gets or sets the obsoletion reason of the code system

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Gets or sets the URL of the code system

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Gets or sets the version text of the code system

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Gets or sets the human description

parameters.name: updatedTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time that this object was last modified in ISO format

parameters.name: modifiedOn
parameters.description: Gets the time this item was modified

parameters.name: updatedBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the provenance identifier associated with the last update of this object

parameters.name: creationTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the creation time as an ISO date format

parameters.name: obsoletionTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time that the data is no longer valid (was deleted/obsoleted) in ISO format

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security provenance object which represents the creation of this object

parameters.name: obsoletedBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security provenance object which represents the obsoletion of this data

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Gets or sets the primary identifying UUID of this object

get.summary: Perform a search (query) for
get.description: The search operation calls the database and loads results either from cache or data store. Care should be taken in the number of results retrieved by this operation.

parameters.name: _offset
parameters.description: The offet of the first result to return

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: The count of items to return in this result set

parameters.name: _orderBy
parameters.description: Instructs the result set to be ordered

parameters.name: _includeRefs
parameters.description: True if all referenced objects should be loaded

parameters.name: _lean
parameters.description: True if the result bundle should only contains primary results

parameters.name: _all
parameters.description: True if all properties should be expanded

parameters.name: _expand
parameters.description: The names of the properties which should be forced loaded

parameters.name: _exclude
parameters.description: The names of the properties which should removed from the bundle

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Gets or sets the observed quantity

parameters.name: valueType
parameters.description: Value type

parameters.name: unitOfMeasure
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the uom concept

parameters.name: interpretationConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the interpretation concept

parameters.name: isNegated
parameters.description:
Gets or sets an indicator which identifies whether the act actually occurred, or
            specifically did not occur

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Gets the template UUID upon which this act is based

parameters.name: actTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the moment in time that this act occurred in ISO format

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time when the act should or did start ocurring in ISO format

parameters.name: stopTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time when the act should or did stop ocurring in ISO format

parameters.name: classConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which classifies the act.

parameters.name: moodConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which specifies the mood of the act.

parameters.name: reasonConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which defines the reason why the act is or didn't occur

parameters.name: statusConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which describes the current status of the act

parameters.name: typeConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the conccept which further classifies the type of act occurring

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Gets or sets the identifiers by which this act is known as in other systems

parameters.name: relationship
parameters.description: Gets a list of all associated acts for this act

parameters.name: policy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security policy instances associated with the act

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: Gets a list of all extensions associated with the act

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: Gets a list of all notes associated with the act

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Gets a list of all tags associated with the act

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: Identifies protocols attached to the act

parameters.name: participation
parameters.description: Gets or sets the entities and participations they play in the act

parameters.name: geo
parameters.description: Gets or sets the geo-tag

parameters.name: previousVersion
parameters.description: Gets or sets the UUID of the previous version of this record

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Gets or sets the UUID of the current version of this object

parameters.name: sequence
parameters.description: The sequence number of the version (for ordering)

parameters.name: creationTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the creation time as an ISO date format

parameters.name: obsoletionTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time that the data is no longer valid (was deleted/obsoleted) in ISO format

parameters.name: modifiedOn
parameters.description: Gets the time that the object was last modified (from base data, default to CreationTime)

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security provenance object which represents the creation of this object

parameters.name: obsoletedBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security provenance object which represents the obsoletion of this data

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Gets or sets the primary identifying UUID of this object

patch.summary: Updates the specified resource according to the instructions in the PATCH file
patch.description:
The PATCH operation allows for partial updating of a resource. 
            
            This method must be used in conjunction with an If-Match header indicating the version that you would like apply the patch against.
            
            The server will load the most recent version and compre the version code with If-Match, if the match is successful the instructions in the PATCH are applied to the loaded version.

patch.summary: Updates the specified resource according to the instructions in the PATCH file
patch.description:
The PATCH operation allows for partial updating of a resource. 
            
            This method must be used in conjunction with an If-Match header indicating the version that you would like apply the patch against.
            
            The server will load the most recent version and compre the version code with If-Match, if the match is successful the instructions in the PATCH are applied to the loaded version.

put.summary: Updates the specified resource. If the resource does not exist than a 404 is thrown, if there is a conflict (such a mismatch of data) a 409 is thrown

            Note: If you post an incomplete object (such as one missing identifiers, or addresses) then the current resource will have those attributes removed. For partial updates, use the PATCH operation instead.

patch.summary: Updates the specified resource according to the instructions in the PATCH file
patch.description:
The PATCH operation allows for partial updating of a resource. 
            
            This method must be used in conjunction with an If-Match header indicating the version that you would like apply the patch against.
            
            The server will load the most recent version and compre the version code with If-Match, if the match is successful the instructions in the PATCH are applied to the loaded version.

409.description: The patch submitted does not match the current version of the object being patched

put.summary: Updates the specified resource. If the resource does not exist than a 404 is thrown, if there is a conflict (such a mismatch of data) a 409 is thrown
put.description:
This operation will update an existing resource on the server such that the data in the database exactly matches the data passed via the API.
            
            Note: If you post an incomplete object (such as one missing identifiers, or addresses) then the current resource will have those attributes removed. For partial updates, use the PATCH operation instead.

patch.summary: Updates the specified resource according to the instructions in the PATCH file
patch.description:
The PATCH operation allows for partial updating of a resource. 
            
            This method must be used in conjunction with an If-Match header indicating the version that you would like apply the patch against.
            
            The server will load the most recent version and compre the version code with If-Match, if the match is successful the instructions in the PATCH are applied to the loaded version.

patch.summary: Updates the specified resource according to the instructions in the PATCH file
patch.description:
The PATCH operation allows for partial updating of a resource. 
            
            This method must be used in conjunction with an If-Match header indicating the version that you would like apply the patch against.
            
            The server will load the most recent version and compre the version code with If-Match, if the match is successful the instructions in the PATCH are applied to the loaded version.

put.summary: Updates the specified resource. If the resource does not exist than a 404 is thrown, if there is a conflict (such a mismatch of data) a 409 is thrown
put.description:

            Note: If you post an incomplete object (such as one missing identifiers, or addresses) then the current resource will have those attributes removed. For partial updates, use the PATCH operation instead.

patch.summary: Updates the specified resource according to the instructions in the PATCH file
patch.description:
The PATCH operation allows for partial updating of a resource. 
            
            This method must be used in conjunction with an If-Match header indicating the version that you would like apply the patch against.
            
            The server will load the most recent version and compre the version code with If-Match, if the match is successful the instructions in the PATCH are applied to the loaded version.

patch.summary: Updates the specified resource according to the instructions in the PATCH file

            This method must be used in conjunction with an If-Match header indicating the version that you would like apply the patch against.
            
            The server will load the most recent version and compre the version code with If-Match, if the match is successful the instructions in the PATCH are applied to the loaded version.

patch.summary: Updates the specified resource according to the instructions in the PATCH file
patch.description:
The PATCH operation allows for partial updating of a resource. 
            
            This method must be used in conjunction with an If-Match header indicating the version that you would like apply the patch against.
            
            The server will load the most recent version and compre the version code with If-Match, if the match is successful the instructions in the PATCH are applied to the loaded version.

put.summary: Updates the specified resource. If the resource does not exist than a 404 is thrown, if there is a conflict (such a mismatch of data) a 409 is thrown
put.description:
This operation will update an existing resource on the server such that the data in the database exactly matches the data passed via the API.
            
            Note: If you post an incomplete object (such as one missing identifiers, or addresses) then the current resource will have those attributes removed. For partial updates, use the PATCH operation instead.

get.summary: Returns a list of patches for the specified resource

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Gets or sets the name of the code system

parameters.name: oid
parameters.description: Gets or sets the Oid of the code system

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: Gets or sets the authority of the code system

parameters.name: obsoletionReason
parameters.description: Gets or sets the obsoletion reason of the code system

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Gets or sets the URL of the code system

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Gets or sets the version text of the code system

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Gets or sets the human description

parameters.name: updatedTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time that this object was last modified in ISO format

parameters.name: modifiedOn
parameters.description: Gets the time this item was modified

parameters.name: updatedBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the provenance identifier associated with the last update of this object

parameters.name: creationTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the creation time as an ISO date format

parameters.name: obsoletionTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time that the data is no longer valid (was deleted/obsoleted) in ISO format

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security provenance object which represents the creation of this object

parameters.name: obsoletedBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security provenance object which represents the obsoletion of this data

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Gets or sets the primary identifying UUID of this object

get.summary: Returns a list of patches for the specified resource

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Gets or sets the observed quantity

parameters.name: valueType
parameters.description: Value type

parameters.name: unitOfMeasure
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the uom concept

parameters.name: interpretationConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the interpretation concept

parameters.name: isNegated
parameters.description:
Gets or sets an indicator which identifies whether the act actually occurred, or
            specifically did not occur

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Gets the template UUID upon which this act is based

parameters.name: actTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the moment in time that this act occurred in ISO format

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time when the act should or did start ocurring in ISO format

parameters.name: stopTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time when the act should or did stop ocurring in ISO format

parameters.name: classConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which classifies the act.

parameters.name: moodConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which specifies the mood of the act.

parameters.name: reasonConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which defines the reason why the act is or didn't occur

parameters.name: statusConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which describes the current status of the act

parameters.name: typeConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the conccept which further classifies the type of act occurring

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Gets or sets the identifiers by which this act is known as in other systems

parameters.name: relationship
parameters.description: Gets a list of all associated acts for this act

parameters.name: policy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security policy instances associated with the act

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: Gets a list of all extensions associated with the act

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: Gets a list of all notes associated with the act

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Gets a list of all tags associated with the act

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: Identifies protocols attached to the act

parameters.name: participation
parameters.description: Gets or sets the entities and participations they play in the act

parameters.name: geo
parameters.description: Gets or sets the geo-tag

parameters.name: previousVersion
parameters.description: Gets or sets the UUID of the previous version of this record

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Gets or sets the UUID of the current version of this object

parameters.name: sequence
parameters.description: The sequence number of the version (for ordering)

parameters.name: creationTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the creation time as an ISO date format

parameters.name: obsoletionTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time that the data is no longer valid (was deleted/obsoleted) in ISO format

parameters.name: modifiedOn
parameters.description: Gets the time that the object was last modified (from base data, default to CreationTime)

parameters.name: createdBy

            The barcode is generated using the server's configuration, and is signed by the server's signing key. 
            
            For complete specification see: https://help.santesuite.org/santedb/extending-santedb/service-apis/health-data-service-interface-hdsi/digitally-signed-visual-code-api

parameters.name: dischargeDisposition
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of discharge disposition

parameters.name: isNegated
parameters.description:
Gets or sets an indicator which identifies whether the act actually occurred, or
            specifically did not occur

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Gets the template UUID upon which this act is based

parameters.name: actTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the moment in time that this act occurred in ISO format

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time when the act should or did start ocurring in ISO format

parameters.name: stopTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time when the act should or did stop ocurring in ISO format

parameters.name: classConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which classifies the act.

parameters.name: moodConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which specifies the mood of the act.

parameters.name: reasonConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which defines the reason why the act is or didn't occur

parameters.name: statusConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the concept which describes the current status of the act

parameters.name: typeConcept
parameters.description: Gets or sets the key of the conccept which further classifies the type of act occurring

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Gets or sets the identifiers by which this act is known as in other systems

parameters.name: relationship
parameters.description: Gets a list of all associated acts for this act

parameters.name: policy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security policy instances associated with the act

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: Gets a list of all extensions associated with the act

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: Gets a list of all notes associated with the act

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Gets a list of all tags associated with the act

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: Identifies protocols attached to the act

parameters.name: participation
parameters.description: Gets or sets the entities and participations they play in the act

parameters.name: geo
parameters.description: Gets or sets the geo-tag

parameters.name: previousVersion
parameters.description: Gets or sets the UUID of the previous version of this record

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Gets or sets the UUID of the current version of this object

parameters.name: sequence
parameters.description: The sequence number of the version (for ordering)

parameters.name: creationTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the creation time as an ISO date format

parameters.name: obsoletionTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets the time that the data is no longer valid (was deleted/obsoleted) in ISO format

parameters.name: modifiedOn
parameters.description: Gets the time that the object was last modified (from base data, default to CreationTime)

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security provenance object which represents the creation of this object

parameters.name: obsoletedBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets the security provenance object which represents the obsoletion of this data

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Gets or sets the primary identifying UUID of this object

400.description: The provided resource was in an incorrect format

401.description: The principal is unauthorized and needs to either elevate or authenticate themselves

403.description: The principal is not permitted (cannot elevate) to perform the operation

404.description: The requested object does not exist

410.description: The specified object did exist however is no-longer present

415.description: The client is submitting an invalid object

422.description: There was a business rule violation executing the operation

429.description: The server rejected the request due to a throttling constraint

500.description: The server encountered an error processing the result

503.description: The service is not available (starting up or shutting down)

get.summary: Gets the digitally signed pointer (in JWS format) for the resource
get.description:
This operation (like the _code operation) generates a digitally signed pointer for an object. Rather than rendering that pointer as a visual code, the API will return
            the structured contents of that code so the client can best determine how to represent the data.
            
            For complete specification see: https://help.santesuite.org/santedb/extending-santedb/service-apis/health-data-service-interface-hdsi/digitally-signed-visual-code-api
